data: Seeing Bathurst this evening, after a lapse of eight years, has given me a most insistent inclination to set down, for the first time, the real facts of that _cause célèbre_, that was called by the Press at the time, the “Billiard Room Mystery.”
browsing: culture/civilization/society|browsing: crime/mystery|browsing: fiction|category: crime, thrillers and mystery|category: novels|category: british literature
